description: Describes the optional principal information of the user of an application which is being derived from a bearer token of a request.

email.description: The Email address of the user. This will be derived from the email claims of a token like email, emailAddress or upn.
email.title: email

name.description: The given name of the user. This will be derived from the common name claims of a token like name or given_name.
name.title: name

tokenValidated.description: This will be true if the apex was able to validate the token in the request.
tokenValidated.title: tokenValidated

title: PrincipalAppUser
